-FROM node:20.0 AS build-stage
+FROM node:18.0 AS build-stage
 
 WORKDIR /app
 
 COPY package.json .
@@ -12,9 +12,9 @@
 
 RUN npm run build
 
 # production stage
-FROM node:20.0 AS production-stage
+FROM node:18.0 AS production-stage
 
 COPY --from=build-stage /app/dist /app
 COPY --from=build-stage /app/package.json /app/package.json

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
FROM node:20.0 AS build-stage

WORKDIR /app

COPY package.json .

RUN npm config set registry https://registry.npmmirror.com/

RUN npm install

COPY . .

RUN npm run build

# production stage
FROM node:20.0 AS production-stage

COPY --from=build-stage /app/dist /app
COPY --from=build-stage /app/package.json /app/package.json

WORKDIR /app

RUN npm config set registry https://registry.npmmirror.com/

RUN npm install --production

EXPOSE 3005

CMD ["node", "/app/main.js"]
